name: Fatty Pants WorldWide Soccer
description:
Fatty Pants WorldWide Soccer is an amazing game featuring more than 1100 levels. The game is about collecting footballs spinning around the globe. You will be controlling your player named fatty pants.
you can tap on the screen to activate mr fatty pants' jet pack in order to hover high to collect the soccer balls which are higher.

NOTE: you can skip a level by pressing the lock icon on top right of the screen.

each level has a unique formation of balls which you have to collect. there are also black hammer balls in the line which would be deadly if you touch them.

you have to make sure you only collect the soccer balls and stay away from the black ones.

The game presents the player with beautiful environment which is a mix of 2d flat and polygon art.

Share screenshots with your player and challenge them to see you have complete more levels.

Credit: Music by Erik Skiff
